node.text:
Award-winning mobile filmmaker Cassius Rayner (@gofilmit) is back with Episode 5 of "The Making of DEAD EYE!" Follow along as Cassius takes a deep dive into the #colorgrading process using @FilmConvert with footage shot in #FiLMiCPro 10-bit! 

#mobilefilmmaking​​​ #smartphonefilmmaking #filmmaking #postproduction #behindthescenes #shortfilm #mobilefilm #videography #cinematography #iOS #Android #iPhone12

node.title: The Making of DEAD EYE: Episode 5 - Color Grading

node.text:
Award-winning mobile filmmaker Cassius Rayner (@gofilmit) walks you through the use of slow-motion in DEAD EYE (why and how), and then takes a look at the various external lenses he used to amplify the drama and action on screen. Check it out!

#mobilefilmmaking #smartphonefilmmaking #tutorial #mobilevideo #filmmaking #videography #cinematography #slomo #slowmotion #moment #lenses #iOS #Android

node.title: The Making of DEAD EYE: Episode 4 - Slow-Motion & External Lenses

node.text:
In "The Making of DEAD EYE: Episode Three," multi-award-winning mobile filmmaker @gofilmit takes a deep dive into #GIMBALS, from selecting the best one for your project to making the most of its features during your shoot. Plus, Cassius talks about key factors to consider when buying your first (or second or third) gimbal!

Learn more about FiLMiC Pro via the link in our bio! ​​​
FiLMiC Pro: Empowering the Next Generation 

#FiLMiCPro​​​ #mobilefilmmaking​​​ #smartphonefilmmaking #shotonFiLMiC #London #UnitedKingdom #setlife #BTS #mobilevideo #shortfilm #filmmaking #cinematography #videography

node.title: The Making of DEAD EYE: Episode 3 - Gimbals

node.text:
#Cinematch — the camera matching plugin from the makers of @FilmConvert — has just received support for #FiLMiCPro Log V3* which is available on 12 series 10-bit capable iPhones. Now you can quickly match your #iPhone12 footage shot in FiLMiC Log V3 to cameras from #Blackmagic, #ARRI, #RED, #Sony, and #Fujifilm - in just a few clicks! 

In this #tutorial, you will learn not only what is possible when using Cinematch (#DavinciResolve or #PremierePro) and FiLMiC Log V3, but also how to use Cinematch in Davinci Resolve.

* Log V3 is part of the cinematographer kit and available as an optional in-app purchase in FiLMiC Pro and available on 10-bit capable 12 series iPhones only.

#cinematography #videography #mobilevideo #filmmaking #mobilefilmmaking #FiLMiC #FilmConvert #colorgrade #colorgrading #smartphonefilmmaking

node.title: Using FilmConvert's Cinematch Plug-in with FiLMiC Pro Log V3

Award-winning mobile #filmmaker Cassius Rayner (@gofilmit) gives you the inside scoop on shooting with the #iPhone12ProMax with #FiLMiCPro 10-bit LOG capture AND using the new deLOG V3 LUT to get the most from your post-production color grade! 

Learn more and download FiLMiC Pro for #iOS & #Android on our website or in your favorite app store!​​​ #filmmaking #mobilefilmmaking #iPhone #indiefilm #videography #cinematography #mobilevideo #mobilefilmmaking #London

FiLMiC Pro: Empowering the Next Generation 
#FiLMiCPro​​​ #filmmaking​​​ #mobilevideo

node.title: Mobile Filmmaking Ep. 12: iPhone 12 Pro Max with 10-bit LOG Capture

Award-winning mobile #filmmaker @gofilmit will make you think again in this episode when he goes old-school to show you how to get the most out of your #iPhone8Plus with #FiLMiCPro in Episode 11 of "#MobileFilmmaking with Cassius Rayner!"

FiLMiC Pro: Empowering the Next Generation
#filmmaking​​ #mobilevideo #setlife #London #indiefilm #cinematography #videography #tutorial #filmmakingtutorial

node.title: Mobile Filmmaking Ep. 11: Filming with an iPhone 8 Plus and FiLMiC Pro

node.text:
Close out 2020 by joining multi-award-winning filmmaker @gofilmit ON LOCATION with #FiLMiCPro in Episode 8 (Redux) of "Mobile Filmmaking with Cassius Rayner." 

Learn how to use FiLMiC Pro to strike the perfect balance between natural and artificial light to get great footage for your next on-location shoot!

FiLMiC Pro: Empowering the Next Generation

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by FiLMiC Pro on August 12, 2021. May be an image of fruit and text that says 'Shoot and edit 10bit SDR on mobile with LogV3 FiLMC LumaFusion'.

node.text:
Did you know you can shoot 10-bit SDR LogV3 on mobile with #FiLMiCPro and then edit with #LumaFusion to maintain a completely #madeonmobile workflow? LumaFusion takes your FiLMiC Pro Log V3 footage and automatically saves it as a LUT in the color and effects menu, making it super convenient for editors to access. #gamechanger 

#filmmaking #editing #mobilefilmmaking #mobileediting #FiLMiC #postproduction

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by FiLMiC Pro on August 04, 2021. May be an image of phone, screen and text that says 'CLEAN HDMI OUT Video HDMI Capture 00:00:00 ....+. Available on the App Store GET ON Google Play'.

node.text:
Clean HDMI Out in FiLMiC Pro allows you to output a high quality video feed without distracting UI clutter.

Turn your #smartphone running #FiLMiCPro into a live production camera with #HDMI switchers like the Atem Mini from Blackmagic design, a #webcam with the Elgato Cam Link 4k, or just stream a clean feed wirelessly to your Apple TV using Airplay on #iOS.

Click the link in our bio to access the official tutorial!

#filmmaking #livestreaming #Android #livestream #YouTube #vlog #videography #FiLMiC

node.text:
In "The Making of DEAD EYE: Episode Three," multi-award-winning mobile filmmaker @gofilmit takes a deep dive into #GIMBALS, from selecting the best one for your project to making the most of its features during your shoot. Plus, Cassius talks about key factors to consider when buying your first (or second or third) gimbal!

Learn more about FiLMiC Pro via the link in our bio! ​​​
FiLMiC Pro: Empowering the Next Generation 

#FiLMiCPro​​​ #mobilefilmmaking​​​ #smartphonefilmmaking #shotonFiLMiC #London #UnitedKingdom #setlife #BTS #mobilevideo #shortfilm #filmmaking #cinematography #videography

📱: Neill Barham

node.text:
Episode 2 of our new "Making of DEAD EYE" learning series features multi-award-winning mobile filmmaker, @gofilmit, & special guest @montyg.uk!

Cassius shows you best practices for framing shots with #FiLMiCPro and then talks to Georgie about acting on a mobile production!

#smartphonefilmmaking #mobilefilmmaking #shortfilm #indiefilm #behindthescenes #BTS #filmmaking #supportindiefilm #setlife #onset #UK #London #

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by FiLMiC Pro on July 06, 2021. May be an image of car, outdoors and text that says '8463 MOBILE FILMMAKING with Cassius Rayner NEW SERIES POLICE MJ70 The Making of DEAD EYE Episode 1: Gear'.

node.text:
"#MobileFilmmaking with Cassius Rayner" returns with a brand new learning series: "The Making of DEAD EYE," @gofilmit's "shot on #FiLMiCPro" dramatic thriller! In Ep1, learn all about the mobile #filmmaking gear and the FiLMiC Pro settings Cassius used to make his latest short! Watch on our #YouTube channel or via the link in our bio!

#smartphonefilmmaking #london #UKfilm #DeadEyeshortfilm #shortfilm #shortfilmmaking #setlife #behindthescenes #BTS

node.text:
New feature coming to #FiLMiCPro v6.15! The audio gain adjustment slider is now embedded in the audio meter! This update is rolling out around the world today for ultra-widescreen #iOS and #Android devices.
